metadata.name: Little Red Riding Hood v2 2/100
metadata.description: Little Red Riding Hood v2 is an upgraded NFT from TedsLittleDream's debut drop of the same name in March 2021. Combining art with smart contract, TedsLittleDream (Artist), protein (Smart Contract Developer), and Kenson (Animator), have created an NFT that changes with the passage of time. Collectors can choose which part of the world they'd like their NFT's seasons to track, then sit back and watch as the weather in their NFT changes daily and with the seasons.
